description: Prime Minister Shri Narendra Modi addresses the nation through his Radio Address, Mann Ki Baat. This month's episode sees citizens from various corners of the nation addressing their questions and sug
caption: soundcloud.com
message:
Today’s #MannKiBaat…on accomplishments of our budding scientists, first batch of women fighter pilots inducted into IAF, water conservation. 

If you have a real life example or a thought on how Yoga can mitigate diabetes, please share it using #YogaFightsDiabetes. #MannKiBaat. https://soundcloud.com/narendramodi/pm-modis-mann-ki-baat-june-2016
